Global Privacy Policy - Worldwide

11. Notice to European Users

Cookie Notice

Our Service may use both session cookies (which expire once you close your web browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your computer or mobile device until you delete them).
In particular, we use these Strictly Necessary cookies to remember your privacy choices and for security purposes.
Our Service uses cookies, in combination with other tracking technologies (collectively, "cookies" unless otherwise noted) to distinguish you from other users of the Service.
Targeting cookies record your visit to our Service, the pages you have visited and the links you have followed.

We or third party providers may use this information to personalize the content you see on internet.
We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions.
We value your privacy

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic.
You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the Service will not then work.
In these cases, we process end user personal information on behalf of our enterprise customers and our use of such information is typically subject to our agreements with those enterprise customers.
We may also share information about our users with these companies to facilitate interest-based advertising to those or similar users on other online platforms.
